Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Ashland, Congress, Loomis and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Ashland, Congress, Loomis and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Purple Line Express Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Purple Line Express trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Armitage. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Purple Line Express trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Armitage.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
